articles.title: France head coach Deschamps signs new contract until 2026
articles.description: France coach Didier Deschamps has extended his contract until July 2026, the French football federation (FFF) said in a statement on Saturday.
articles.content:
France head coach Didier Deschamps has extended his contract until July 2026, the French football federation (FFF) said in a statement on Saturday.

articles.title: NCAA looking into Michigan for potential college football infractions
articles.description: The NCAA is investigating Michigan's football program for alleged violations during the COVID-19 recruiting dead period,
articles.content:
Michigan has received notice from the NCAA that it is looking into potential rules infractions in the Wolverines' football program, the team announced Friday.

articles.title: Damar Hamlin's recovery is cause for celebration and relief
articles.description: During one of football's worst weeks, those in the sport showed their best side. As thoughts remain with Damar Hamlin, that is a reason for some cheer.
